description: Building a chatbot with Python, in this course we will learn about Building a Chatbot with Python, covering fundamental concepts, tools, and techniques to develop intelligent conversational agents. You will explore Natural Language Processing (NLP), machine learning, and rule-based chatbots using Python libraries like NLTK, SpaCy, and TensorFlow. Learn how to preprocess text data, design chatbot responses, and integrate APIs for real-world applications. The course includes hands-on projects such as creating customer support bots and deploying them on platforms like Telegram and WhatsApp. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, this course provides a structured approach to building, training, and optimizing chatbots using Python. Great Learning
